feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-06-19T09:57:40.683439Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;OpenLLM</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/bentoml/OpenLLM</id>; <updated>;2023-06-19T07:57:04.339849Z</updated >; <link href="https://github.com/bentoml/OpenLLM"/>; <author>; <name>;fzliu</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=fzliu< /uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bentoml/OpenLLM/main/assets/main-banner.png" style="宽度：220px ; 高度：124px;" />;<br />;用于在生产中运行大型语言模型 (LLM) 的开放平台。轻松微调、服务、部署和监控任何 LLM。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#openllm" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id= 36388219" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type=" text">;TypeScript 5.2 的新关键字：'using'</stitle>; <id>;https://www.totaltypescript.com/typescript-5-2-new-keyword-using</id>; <updated>;2023- 06-19T09:07:04.341780Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.totaltypescript.com/typescript-5-2-new-keyword-using"/>; <author>; <name>;Lwrless</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Lwrless</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.totaltypescript.com /_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fseal%402x.ad1843e8.png&w=384&q=100" style="宽度：220px；高度：206px；" />;<br />;TypeScript 5.2 将引入一个新的关键字 - 'using' - 当它离开范围时，您可以使用它来处理任何带有 Symbol.dispose 函数的东西。这是基于最近达到第 3 阶段的 TC39 提案，表明它即将进入 JavaScript。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#typescript-5-2-s-new-keyword-using" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36388894" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;我对 Nix 的第一印象</stitle>; <id>;https://mtlynch.io/notes/nix-first-impressions/</id>; <updated>; 2023-06-19T06:57:04.345858Z</updated>; <link href="https://mtlynch.io/notes/nix-first-impressions/"/>; <author>; <name>;signa11</name>; < uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=signa11</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://d33wubrfki0l68.cloudfront.net/ae57cc51889fbe1643c1a73bbd2f7e83afe3be70/ aac5f/notes/nix-first-impressions/hashimoto-tweet.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：154px；" />;<br />;Nix是一个根据源文件配置软件环境的工具。它允许您在源代码中定义计算机系统的配置，并使系统进入该状态。 Nix 旨在配置其所在的环境，而 Ansible 旨在通过网络配置系统。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#my-first-impressions-of-nix" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36387874" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;同时在 3 个游戏机上发布独立游戏并在财务上失败（2016 年）</stitle>; <id>;https://juicybeast.com/2016/01/11/releasing-an -indie-game-on-3-consoles-at-once-and-failing-financially/#2-years</id>; <updated>;2023-06-19T03:57:04.346333Z</updated>; <link href= “https://juicybeast.com/2016/01/11/releasing-an-indie-game-on-3-consoles-at-once-and-failing-financially/#2-years”/>; <作者>; <名称>;plateofsoup</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=plateofsoup</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="http:// juicybeast.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/legrimpeur_HD_cropped.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：100px；" />;<br />;一次在 3 个游戏机上发布独立游戏并在财务上失败（2016 年）<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#releasing-an-indie-game-on-3-consoles -at-once-and-failing-financially-2016" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36387030" target=" _blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示HN : Slint - 用 Rust 编写的用于嵌入式和桌面的声明式 UI 工具包</stitle>; <id>;https://slint.dev</id>; <updated>;2023-06-19T08:58:04.346666Z</updated>; < link href="https://slint.dev"/>; <author>; <name>;ogoffart</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ogoffart</uri>; </author >; <content type="html">;<img src="https://slint.dev/assets/img/responsive.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：143px；" />;<br />;使用实时预览通过快速迭代完成您的 UI 设计。调整所有内容，例如颜色、动画、几何图形或文本，并立即验证更改。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-slint-a-declarative-ui-toolkit-written-in-rust-for-embedded-desktop" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36388821" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml :base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Sketch.systems</stitle>; <id>;https://sketch.systems</id>; <更新>;2023-06-19T05:57:04.346981Z</updated>; <link href="https://sketch.systems"/>; <author>; <name>;surprisetalk</name>; <uri>;https://news. ycombinator.com/user?id=surprisetalk</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Sketch.systems 是一种基于 David Harel 在 1980 年代开发的状态图形式主义的绘图工具。它允许用户通过单击图表来浏览系统草图。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#sketch-systems" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item? id=36378731" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题类型="text">;在 FPGA 上构建网络键值存储</stitle>; <id>;https://adamwalker.github.io/Building-FPGA-KVS/</id>; <updated>;2023-06- 19T05:57:04.347292Z</updated>; <link href="https://adamwalker.github.io/Building-FPGA-KVS/"/>; <author>; <name>;todsacerdoti</name>; <uri>;https: //news.ycombinator.com/user?id=todsacerdoti</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://adamwalker.github.io/images/arty.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px；" />;<br />;这篇文章是关于在功能性硬件描述语言 Clash 中构建基于 FPGA 的网络键值存储。它描述了 FPGA 定制的哈希表设计、测试框架及其性能和资源使用情况。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#building-a-networked-key-value-store-on-an-fpga" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36387477" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;MoonRay——梦工厂的开源 MCRT 渲染器</stitle>; <id>;https://openmoonray.org/download</id>; <updated >;2023-06-19T07:57:04.349029Z</updated>; <link href="https://openmoonray.org/download"/>; <author>; <name>;ColinWright</name>; <uri>;https:// news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ColinWright</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;GitHub 上的 openmoonray 存储库是 MoonRay 开源的顶级存储库。实际的源代码包含在许多其他存储库中，这些存储库被称为 git 子模块。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#moonray-dreamworks-open-source-mcrt-renderer" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36388433" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Keycloak – 开源身份和访问管理访谈</stitle>; <id>;https://console.substack.com/i/128451029/interview-with-michal- of-keycloak-open-source-identity-and-access-management-for-modern-applications</id>; <updated>;2023-06-18T21:57:04.349398Z</updated>; <link href="https:/ /console.substack.com/i/128451029/interview-with-michal-of-keycloak-open-source-identity-and-access-management-for-modern-applications"/>; <author>; <name>;ph4ni</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ph4ni</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image /fetch/w_1200,h_600,c_fill,f_jpg,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep,g_auto/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F1f02d299-2c64-4e17-a333 -47d3054df48d_1600x836.png" style="width: 220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;Keycloak 是一种用于现代应用程序和服务的开源身份和访问管理解决方案。它提供了一种简单而安全的身份验证和用户管理方法，支持 OpenID Connect、OAuth 等标准协议2.0 和 SAML。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#keycloak-open-source-identity-and-access-management-interview" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36384636" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Openjob：最佳分布式任务调度框架</stitle>; <id>;https://habr.com/en/articles/742470/ </id>; <updated>;2023-06-19T03:57:04.350183Z</updated>; <link href="https://habr.com/en/articles/742470/"/>; <author>; <name>;swoft </name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=swoft</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://hsto.org /r/w1560/getpro/habr/upload_files/77e/f01/d41/77ef01d419ec7e321f7f576030789d23.png" style="width: 220px; height: 123px;" />;<br />;Openjob是一个分布式、高性能的任务调度框架，支持多个cronjob、延时任务、工作流，轻量级分布式计算，无限水平扩展，具有高扩展性和容错性。同时具有完善的权限管理，强大的告警监控，支持多语言<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#openjob-best-distributed-task-scheduling-framework" target="_blank">;[summary]</ a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36387141" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base= "https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;HDR 二维码</stitle>; <id>;https://notes.dt.in.th/HDRQRCode</id >; <updated>;2023-06-18T21:57:04.350623Z</updated>; <link href="https://notes.dt.in.th/HDRQRCode"/>; <author>; <name>;fdb</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=fdb</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://notes.dt.in.th /d7fc70-circle-192.png" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;这是一个 HDR 二维码。如果您在 Apple 设备的内置显示器上查看它，它应该可以工作。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io /#hdr-qr-code" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36384625" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;如何计算 256 位椭圆带 50M Toffoli 门的曲线钥匙</stitle>; <id>;https://arxiv.org/abs/2306.08585</id>; <updated>;2023-06-19T04:57:04.351306Z</updated>; <link href=" https://arxiv.org/abs/2306.08585"/>; <author>; <name>;aburan28</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=aburan28</uri>; </author >; <content type="html">;<img src="https://static.arxiv.org/static/browse/0.3.4/images/arxiv-logo-fb.png" style="width: 220px; height: 129px;" />;<br />;我们使用 Shor 算法计算椭圆曲线私钥，作为硅光子学启发的活动体积架构中资源估计的案例研究。非本地连接降低了每次成本与 2D 局部架构相比，键值提高了 300-700 倍。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#how-to-compute-a-256-bit-elliptic-curve-key-with -50m-toffoli-gates" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36387371" target="_blank">;[评论] </a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;行程报告：夏季 ISO C++ 标准会议在保加利亚瓦尔纳</stitle>; <id>;https://herbsutter.com/2023/06/16/trip-report-summer-iso-c-standards-meeting-varna-bulgaria/</id>; <updated>; 2023-06-19T02:57:04.352454Z</updated>; <link href="https://herbsutter.com/2023/06/16/trip-report-summer-iso-c-standards-meeting-varna-bulgaria /"/>; <author>; <name>;agluszak</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=agluszak</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;< img src="https://herbsutter.files.wordpress.com/2023/06/image.png?w=300" style="width: 220px; height: 162px;" />;<br />;ISO C++ 委员会最近结束了在保加利亚瓦尔纳举行的会议，他们开始在 C++26 中采用特性。他们有来自 20 个国家的近 180 名与会者，并采纳了前 40 个提议更改 C++26 的文件，包括错误修复和新功能。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#trip-report-summer-iso-c-standards-meeting-in-varna-bulgaria " target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36373972" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</内容>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Redbean Systems</stitle>; <id>;https://redbean .systems/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-18T20:57:04.352908Z</updated>; <link href="https://redbean.systems/"/>; <author>; <name>;todsacerdoti</name >; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=todsacerdoti</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;这篇文章是一个 Python 脚本，它为运行的客户端设置了一个安全的沙箱代码. 它使用 Cosmopolitan 库并实现了各种安全措施，例如资源限制、进程分叉和系统调用限制。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#redbean-systems" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item? id=36383875" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题类型="text">;GPU 编程：何时、为何以及如何？</stitle>; <id>;https://enccs.github.io/gpu-programming/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-19T00:57： 04.353486Z</updated>; <link href="https://enccs.github.io/gpu-programming/"/>; <author>; <name>;transpute</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator。 com/user?id=transpute</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://enccs.github.io/gpu-programming/_static/ENCCS.jpg" 风格= “宽度：220px；高度：236px；” />;<br />;图形处理单元 (GPU) 是全球许多高性能计算 (HPC) 系统的主力。近年来，Top500 中支持 GPU 的超级计算机的数量一直在稳步增加，而且这种发展有望继续下去。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#gpu-programming-when-why-and-how" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36385938" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：Answer Overflow – 将 Discord 内容编入网络</stitle>; <id>;https://www.answeroverflow.com/</id>; <updated>;2023 -06-18T19:57:04.353926Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.answeroverflow.com/"/>; <author>; <name>;rhyssullivan1</name>; <uri>;https://news .ycombinator.com/user?id=rhyssullivan1</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.answeroverflow.com/answer-overflow-banner-v3.png " style="宽度：220px；高度：116px；" />;<br />;Answer Overflow 是一个开源项目，旨在将不和谐频道引入您最喜爱的搜索引擎，使用户能够轻松、快速地找到他们需要的信息。了解您的社区最常询问的内容以及需要改进文档的地方。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-answer-overflow-indexing-discord-content-into-the-web" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36383773" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;世界海洋中有多少沉船？</stitle>; <id>;https://www.bbc.com/future/文章/20230609-世界海洋中有多少沉船</id>; <更新>;2023-06-19T00:57:04.354369Z</更新>; <link href="https:/ /www.bbc.com/future/article/20230609-how-many-shipwrecks-are-there-in-the-worlds-oceans"/>; <author>; <name>;Thevet</name>; <uri>;https:/ /news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Thevet</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://ychef.files.bbci.co.uk/976x549/p0ft978s .jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：124px；" />;<br />;本周，联合国教科文组织宣布发现了三艘新沉船，其中两艘已有数千年历史。根据联合国教科文组织的分析，世界海洋中有超过 300 万种生物未被发现。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#how-many-shipwrecks-are-there-in-the-world-s-oceans" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36374370" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;完成</stitle>; <id>;https://boz.com/articles/get-it-done</id>; <updated>;2023-06-18T19:57:04.355393Z</updated>; <link href="https://boz.com/articles/get-it-done"/>; <author>; <name>;kiyanwang</name >; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=kiyanwang</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://boz.com/get- it-done.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：116px；" />;<br />;在我的职业生涯中，我发现我必须更频繁地给出的建议是让人们更直接地影响他们的领导者。我经常看到负责实现重要目标的人在面临巨大困难的情况下竭尽全力。这份工作的使命不是“尽力而为”，而是完成它。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#get-it-done" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/ item?id=36383322" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;Swing VPN 应用是 DDoS 僵尸网络</stitle>; <id>;https://lecromee.github.io/posts/swing_vpn_ddosing_sites/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-18T18:57: 04.356141Z</updated>; <link href="https://lecromee.github.io/posts/swing_vpn_ddosing_sites/"/>; <author>; <name>;campuscodi</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator。 com/user?id=campuscodi</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://lecromee.github.io/image/swing/android_install.png" style="宽度: 220px; 高度: 107px;" />;<br />;Swing VPN 应用程序通过将其用户转变为攻击僵尸网络，利用其用户群访问 DDOS 站点。该应用程序每 10 秒向特定网站发送一次请求，以特定端点为目标使服务器资源过载。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#swing-vpn-app-is-a-ddos-botnet" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36382700" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;语言学家发现了南佛罗里达州出现的一种新英语方言</stitle>; <id>;https://theconversation.com/linguists-have-identified-a- new-english-dialect-thats-emerging-in-south-florida-205620</id>; <updated>;2023-06-18T19:57:04.356714Z</updated>; <link href="https://theconversation.com /linguists-have-identified-a-new-english-dialect-thats-emerging-in-south-florida-205620"/>; <author>; <name>;Tomte</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator .com/user?id=Tomte</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://images.theconversation.com/files/530654/original/file-20230607-23 -bbcsrb.jpg?ixlib=rb-1.1.0&rect=3%2C9%2C2171%2C1548&q=20&auto=format&w=320&fit=clip&dpr=2&usm=12&cs=strip" style="width: 220px; height: 157px;" />;<br />;由于西班牙语和英语使用者之间的持续接触，南佛罗里达州正在出现一种新的英语方言。这种方言的特点是借用西班牙语单词并直接从西班牙语翻译过来。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#linguists-have-identified-a-new-english-dialect-thats-emerging-in-south-florida" target="_blank">;[摘要]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36383521" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;1990 年代的神经网络</stitle>; <id>;https://twitter.com/id_aa_carmack/status/1670558589746905090 </id>; <updated>;2023-06-19T00:57:04.357145Z</updated>; <link href="https://twitter.com/id_aa_carmack/status/1670558589746905090"/>; <author>; <name>;jrott< /name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jrott</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;出了点问题，但别担心——我们来解决另一个镜头。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#neural-networks-in-the-1990s" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36385809" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;想象中的问题是不良软件的根源</stitle>; <id>;https://cerebralab.com/Imaginary_Problems_Are_the_Root_of_Bad_Software</id>; <更新>;2023-06-18T14:57： 04.360729Z</updated>; <link href="https://cerebralab.com/Imaginary_Problems_Are_the_Root_of_Bad_Software"/>; <author>; <name>;deofoo</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id =deofoo</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/c/c0/De_Rebus_Bellicis,_XVth_Century_Miniature.JPG" 风格="宽度：220px；高度：148px；" />;<br />;不良软件的根源往往是想象中的问题。开发人员和其他部门创造想象中的问题，使他们的工作更有趣或填补空白。这导致忽视了真正需要解决的问题。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#imaginary-problems-are-the-root-of-bad-software" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36380711" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Miraheze 不会关闭</stitle>; <id>;https://meta.miraheze.org/wiki/Miraheze_is_Not_Shutting_Down</id>; <updated>;2023 -06-19T01:57:04.361369Z</updated>; <link href="https://meta.miraheze.org/wiki/Miraheze_is_Not_Shutting_Down"/>; <author>; <name>;pabs3</name>; <uri>;https: //news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pabs3</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;这对 Miraheze 用户来说是个好消息。感谢为改进和保持服务运行所做的努力。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#miraheze-is-not-shutting-down" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36386112" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;苏联向美国出售钛，认为他们需要它来制作披萨烤炉</stitle>; <id>;https://theaviationgeekclub.com/in-the-early-1960s-soviet-union -把钛卖给我们，相信他们需要它来做比萨饼烤箱，但他们却用它来建造标志性的 SR-71 黑鸟机器-3-间谍飞机/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-18T21:57:04.361876Z</更新>; <link href="https://theaviationgeekclub.com/in-the-early-1960s-soviet -union-sold-titanium-to-the-us-believing-they-needed-it-for-pizza-ovens-but-instead-yet-used-it-to-build-the-iconic-sr-71-blackbird -mach-3-spy-plane/"/>; <author>; <name>;jerryjerryjerry</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jerryjerryjerry</uri>; </author>; < content type="html">;<img src="https://theaviationgeekclub.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/SR-71-Pizza-oven.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 136px;" />;<br />;远程侦察机 SR-71 黑鸟的建造需要钛。美国秘密从他们的冷战敌人苏联购买钛来建造 SR- 71. 苏联人认为美国需要钛来制作披萨烤箱，却不知道他们正在为制造间谍飞机做出贡献。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#soviet-union-sold-titanium- to-us-believing-they-needed-it-for-pizza-ovens" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id= 36384548" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type=" text">;Awesome Lemmy 实例</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/maltfield/awesome-lemmy-instances</id>; <updated>;2023-06-19T06:57:04.362354Z</updated>; < link href="https://github.com/maltfield/awesome-lemmy-instances"/>; <author>; <name>;thunderbong</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=雷电</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/maltfield/awesome-lemmy-instances/main/lemmy-migration-find-subreddits- communities.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 116px;" />;<br />;不同 Lemmy 实例的比较。通过在 GitHub 上创建帐户为 maltfield/awesome-lemmy-instances 开发做出贡献。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/# awesome-lemmy-instances" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36387939" target="_blank">;[评论]< /a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;让微服务看起来像单体</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/crufters/actio</id>; <updated>;2023-06-18T19:57:04.362776Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/crufters/ actio"/>; <author>; <name>;friendly_chap</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=friendly_chap</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;< img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/crufters/actio/main/assets/actiologo.png" style="宽度：220px； height: 221px;" />;<br />;Actio 是一个现代的、包含电池的后端应用程序 Node.js (Typescript) 框架。它使您能够毫不费力地在单体和微服务架构之间切换。<a href="https:/ /hackernews.betacat.io/#make-microservices-look-like-monoliths" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id= 36372283" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
